review: the hotel was okay not too great ,the experience was amazing of being at such an holy place but the food at the hotel was not that great , would prefer some other food options, overall budget Friendly.
name: Partha

review: i stay in hotel gulmohar in haridwar . the room was not clean and staff are not co-oprative. and after that every thing is just an avarage . hotel location is good and room cost is cheapest. we visit haridwar by train. from to hotel  half an hour distance.
